resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157280</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2085</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Development of System Thinking Skills in the Context of Earth System Education</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Entwicklung System der denkenden Fähigkeiten 
im Kontext der Masse System Ausbildung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le développement des qualifications de pensée de
système dans le contexte de l'éducation de système de la terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O desenvolvimento de habilidades pensando do 
sistema no contexto da instrução do sistema da terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo sviluppo delle abilità pensanti del sistema 
nel contesto di formazione del sistema della terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ανάπτυξη των δεξιοτήτων σκέψης συστημάτων στα 
πλαίσια της εκπαίδευσης γήινων συστημάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El desarrollo de las habilidades de pensamiento 
del sistema en el contexto de la educación del sistema de la tierra</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">this article presents a research study which deals with the development of system thinking skills at the junior high school level.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thinking skills</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">dieser Artikel stellt eine Forschung Studie dar, 
die die Entwicklung System der denkenden Fähigkeiten auf der 
Juniorhigh School Stufe beschäftigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cet article présente une étude de recherches qui
traite le développement des qualifications de pensée de système au 
niveau de lycée junior.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">este artigo apresenta um estudo da pesquisa que 
trate do desenvolvimento de habilidades pensando do sistema no nível 
da High School júnior.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">questo articolo presenta uno studio di ricerca che
si occupa dello sviluppo delle abilità pensanti del sistema al 
livello della 'junior high school'.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αυτό το άρθρο παρουσιάζει μια ερευνητική μελέτη που 
εξετάζει την ανάπτυξη των δεξιοτήτων σκέψης συστημάτων στο 
κατώτερο επίπεδο γυμνασίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">este artículo presenta un estudio de la 
investigación que se ocupe del desarrollo de las habilidades de 
pensamiento del sistema en el nivel de la High School secundaria 
menor.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">denkende Fähigkeiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">qualifications de pensée</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">habilidades pensando</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">abilità pensanti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δεξιότητες σκέψης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">habilidades de pensamiento</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
